attributes.action: For the peoples decission to be acted on immediately from EU REFERENDUM
attributes.additional_details: PM HAS RESIGNED. This can only mean the peoples decission should be informed by the people with immediate affect. Activate article 50 so our economy  will be secure
attributes.background: A vote was carried out to leave the EU. OUr PM HAS RESIGNED. This can only mean the peoples decission should be informed by the people with immediate affect. Activate article 50 so our economy  will be secure
